| ------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `pod-os:init`            |                                                                      | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `pod-os:resource-loaded` | Indicates that the resource given in `uri` property has been loaded. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
